wikipedia_page.main: George Boardman (born 14 August 1943) is a Scottish former professional footballer who played as an inside forward. Active in both Scotland and England between 1960 and 1973, Boardman made over 350 League appearances, scoring nearly 100 goals.

response: * George Boardman the Younger (1828–1903), his son, American Baptist theologian and writer
